ROOT.NAME: Fill rate by Cat.
ROOT.QUERY:
/***********************************************************************/ /* Query : Warehouse fill rate by category */ /***********************************************************************/ WITH ORDERID AS (SELECT ECDCEXCDE FROM CDEENTCDE@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, FOUDGENE@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD WHERE TRUNC(ECDDLIV) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ECDCFIN = FOUCFIN AND FOUCNUF NOT LIKE ''CD%''), DETAIL AS (SELECT /*+ materialize */ COMM_ORD, COMM_ORD_DESC, CCLCINRC, (SELECT SUBSTR(SOBCEXT, 7, 3) || '' | '' || PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, SOBCINT, ''HN'') FROM STRUCTURE@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, STRUCREL@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, STRUCOBJ@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD WHERE CCLCINRC = OBJCINT AND OBJPERE = STRCINT AND STRPERE = SOBCINT AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN OBJDDEB AND OBJDFIN AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN STRDDEB AND STRDFIN AND strlevel=1) CAT, SUM(ROUND(COMM_ORD_QTY, 5)) QTY_ORD, COMM_PREP, COMM_PREP_DESC, SUM(ROUND(COMM_PREP_QTY, 5)) QTY_PREP, SUM(ROUND(COMM_SHIP_QTY, 5)) QTY_SHIP FROM (SELECT /*+ materialize */ COMM_ORD, COMM_ORD_DESC, COMM_ORD_QTY, COMM_PREP, COMM_PREP_DESC, COMM_PREP_QTY, COMM_SHIP_QTY, CCLCINRC, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY ARACEXR ORDER BY ARADDEB DESC) RK FROM (SELECT PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC) COMM_ORD, PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC, ''HN'') COMM_ORD_DESC, SUM(CCLQTEC / (DECODE(ARUTYPUL, 81, PKARTSTOCK.GET_SKUUNITS@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, PKARTSTOCK.RECUPERECINLDEST@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLSEQVLC, 41)), DECODE(CCLUVUP, 0, 1, CCLUVUP)))) COMM_ORD_QTY, PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP) COMM_PREP, PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP, ''HN'') COMM_PREP_DESC, SUM(NVL(CCLQTEP, 0) / (DECODE(ARUTYPUL, 81, PKARTSTOCK.GET_SKUUNITS@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, PKARTSTOCK.RECUPERECINLDEST@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLSEQVLC, 41)), DECODE(CCLUVUP, 0, 1, CCLUVUP)))) COMM_PREP_QTY, SUM(NVL(CCLQTEUPX, 0)) COMM_SHIP_QTY, CCLSEQVLC SEQVL_ORD, CCLCINRC FROM CCLDETCCL@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, ORDERID, ARTUL@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD WHERE CCLCEXCDE = ECDCEXCDE AND CCLSITE = :param2 AND CCLTCDE = 1 /* On Stock */ AND CCLSTATUS >= 3 /* Exclude Display Orders*/ AND CCLCINLC = ARUCINL AND TRUNC(CCLDCDE) + 5 > TRUNC(CCLDLIVD) GROUP BY CCLCINRC, PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC), PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC, ''HN''), PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP), PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP, ''HN''), CCLSEQVLC, CCLSITE UNION ALL SELECT PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC) COMM_ORD, PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC, ''HN'') COMM_ORD_DESC, SUM(CCLQTEC / (DECODE(ARUTYPUL, 81, PKARTSTOCK.GET_SKUUNITS@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, PKARTSTOCK.RECUPERECINLDEST@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLSEQVLC, 41)), DECODE(CCLUVUP, 0, 1, CCLUVUP)))) COMM_ORD_QTY, PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP) COMM_PREP, PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP, ''HN'') COMM_PREP_DESC, SUM(NVL(CCLQTEP, 0) / (DECODE(ARUTYPUL, 81, PKARTSTOCK.GET_SKUUNITS@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, PKARTSTOCK.RECUPERECINLDEST@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLSEQVLC, 41)), DECODE(CCLUVUP, 0, 1, CCLUVUP)))) COMM_PREP_QTY, SUM(CCLQTEUPX) COMM_SHIP_QTY, CCLSEQVLC SEQVL_ORD, CCLCINRC FROM HCCLDETCCL@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, ORDERID, ARTUL@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD WHERE CCLCEXCDE = ECDCEXCDE AND CCLSITE = :param2 AND CCLTCDE = 1 /* On Stock */ AND CCLSTATUS >= 3 /*Exclude Display Orders*/ AND CCLCINLC = ARUCINL AND TRUNC(CCLDCDE) + 5 > TRUNC(CCLDLIVD) GROUP BY CCLCINRC, PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC), PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC, ''HN''), PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP), PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP, ''HN''), CCLSEQVLC, CCLSITE), ARTUC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, FOUDGENE@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, SECAPPRO@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, LIENSECAPPRO@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD WHERE COMM_ORD = ARACEXR(+) AND COMM_PREP = ARACEXR(+) AND COMM_PREP = ARACEXR(+) AND COMM_ORD = ARACEXR(+) /* Sector Supply Management*/ AND LIACFIN = FOUCFIN AND LIACINAP = SAPCINAP AND SAPTYPE = 1 /* Supply sector*/ AND LIASITE = ARASITE AND ARASITE = :param2 AND ARACFIN = FOUCFIN AND ARACCIN = LIACCIN AND ARATFOU = 1 AND ARADFIN > TRUNC(SYSDATE - 60))
WHERE RK = 1 GROUP BY CCLCINRC, COMM_ORD, COMM_ORD_DESC, COMM_PREP, COMM_PREP_DESC) SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, ''MM.DD.RR'') || DECODE(:param2, 90061, '' Grocery'', 91070, '' Dairy'', 91071, '' Freezer'', :param2) || '' Fill Rate '' || NVL((SELECT TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(QTY_PREP) / SUM(QTY_ORD), 4) * 100) FROM DETAIL), 100) || ''% & In-Stock Rate '' || TO_CHAR(ROUND((1 - (NVL((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DETAIL WHERE NVL(QTY_PREP, 0) = 0), 0) / NVL((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DETAIL), 1))), 4) * 100) || ''%'' "Category code desc.", NULL "Ord. quantity", NULL "Prep. quantity", NULL "Holes", NULL "Unique items ord.", NULL "Fill rate", NULL "In-Stock rate", ''Recap'' "Notes" FROM DUAL WHERE (SELECT SUM(QTY_ORD) FROM DETAIL) > 0 UNION SELECT "Category code desc.", "Ord. quantity", "Prep. quantity", "Holes", "Unique items ord.", (ROUND("Prep. quantity"/"Ord. quantity",4)* 100) "Fill rate", (ROUND((1 - "Holes"/ "Unique items ord.") ,4)* 100) "In-Stock rate", "Notes" FROM (SELECT CAT "Category code desc.", CEIL(SUM(QTY_ORD)) "Ord. quantity", CEIL(SUM(QTY_PREP)) "Prep. quantity", COUNT(CASE WHEN (QTY_ORD - QTY_PREP) > 0 THEN 1 END) "Holes", count(distinct COMM_ORD) "Unique items ord.", '''' "Notes" FROM DETAIL GROUP BY CAT) ORDER BY "Notes" ASC, "Holes" DESC, 1, 2
ROOT.QUERY2:
/***********************************************************************/ /* Query : Warehouse fill rate by category */ /***********************************************************************/ WITH ORDERID AS (SELECT ECDCEXCDE FROM CDEENTCDE@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, FOUDGENE@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD WHERE TRUNC(ECDDLIV) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ECDCFIN = FOUCFIN AND FOUCNUF NOT LIKE ''CD%''), DETAIL AS (SELECT /*+ materialize */ COMM_ORD, COMM_ORD_DESC, CCLCINRC, (select foucnuf || '' | '' || foulibl from FOUDGENE@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, ARTUC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD where arasite=:param2 and aracfin=foucfin and aracinr=cclcinrc and trunc(sysdate) between araddeb and aradfin and aratfou=1 and rownum=1) "Supplier code desc.", (SELECT SUBSTR(SOBCEXT, 7, 3) || '' | '' || PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, SOBCINT, ''HN'') FROM STRUCTURE@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, STRUCREL@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, STRUCOBJ@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD WHERE CCLCINRC = OBJCINT AND OBJPERE = STRCINT AND STRPERE = SOBCINT AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN OBJDDEB AND OBJDFIN AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN STRDDEB AND STRDFIN AND strlevel=1) CAT, SUM(ROUND(COMM_ORD_QTY, 5)) QTY_ORD, COMM_PREP, COMM_PREP_DESC, SUM(ROUND(COMM_PREP_QTY, 5)) QTY_PREP, SUM(ROUND(COMM_SHIP_QTY, 5)) QTY_SHIP FROM (SELECT /*+ materialize */ COMM_ORD, COMM_ORD_DESC, COMM_ORD_QTY, COMM_PREP, COMM_PREP_DESC, COMM_PREP_QTY, COMM_SHIP_QTY, CCLCINRC, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY ARACEXR ORDER BY ARADDEB DESC) RK FROM (SELECT PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC) COMM_ORD, PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC, ''HN'') COMM_ORD_DESC, SUM(CCLQTEC / (DECODE(ARUTYPUL, 81, PKARTSTOCK.GET_SKUUNITS@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, PKARTSTOCK.RECUPERECINLDEST@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLSEQVLC, 41)), DECODE(CCLUVUP, 0, 1, CCLUVUP)))) COMM_ORD_QTY, PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP) COMM_PREP, PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP, ''HN'') COMM_PREP_DESC, SUM(NVL(CCLQTEP, 0) / (DECODE(ARUTYPUL, 81, PKARTSTOCK.GET_SKUUNITS@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, PKARTSTOCK.RECUPERECINLDEST@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLSEQVLC, 41)), DECODE(CCLUVUP, 0, 1, CCLUVUP)))) COMM_PREP_QTY, SUM(NVL(CCLQTEUPX, 0)) COMM_SHIP_QTY, CCLSEQVLC SEQVL_ORD, CCLCINRC FROM CCLDETCCL@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, ORDERID, ARTUL@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD WHERE CCLCEXCDE = ECDCEXCDE AND CCLSITE = :param2 AND CCLTCDE = 1 /* On Stock */ AND CCLSTATUS >= 3 /* Exclude Display Orders*/ AND CCLCINLC = ARUCINL AND TRUNC(CCLDCDE) + 5 > TRUNC(CCLDLIVD) GROUP BY CCLCINRC, PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC), PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC, ''HN''), PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP), PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP, ''HN''), CCLSEQVLC, CCLSITE UNION ALL SELECT PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC) COMM_ORD, PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC, ''HN'') COMM_ORD_DESC, SUM(CCLQTEC / (DECODE(ARUTYPUL, 81, PKARTSTOCK.GET_SKUUNITS@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, PKARTSTOCK.RECUPERECINLDEST@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLSEQVLC, 41)), DECODE(CCLUVUP, 0, 1, CCLUVUP)))) COMM_ORD_QTY, PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP) COMM_PREP, PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP, ''HN'') COMM_PREP_DESC, SUM(NVL(CCLQTEP, 0) / (DECODE(ARUTYPUL, 81, PKARTSTOCK.GET_SKUUNITS@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, PKARTSTOCK.RECUPERECINLDEST@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLSEQVLC, 41)), DECODE(CCLUVUP, 0, 1, CCLUVUP)))) COMM_PREP_QTY, SUM(CCLQTEUPX) COMM_SHIP_QTY, CCLSEQVLC SEQVL_ORD, CCLCINRC FROM HCCLDETCCL@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, ORDERID, ARTUL@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD WHERE CCLCEXCDE = ECDCEXCDE AND CCLSITE = :param2 AND CCLTCDE = 1 /* On Stock */ AND CCLSTATUS >= 3 /*Exclude Display Orders*/ AND CCLCINLC = ARUCINL AND TRUNC(CCLDCDE) + 5 > TRUNC(CCLDLIVD) GROUP BY CCLCINRC, PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC), PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRC, ''HN''), PKARTRAC.GET_ARTCEXR@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP), PKSTRUCOBJ.GET_DESC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD(1, CCLCINRP, ''HN''), CCLSEQVLC, CCLSITE), ARTUC@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, FOUDGENE@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, SECAPPRO@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, LIENSECAPPRO@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD WHERE COMM_ORD = ARACEXR(+) AND COMM_PREP = ARACEXR(+) AND COMM_PREP = ARACEXR(+) AND COMM_ORD = ARACEXR(+) /* Sector Supply Management*/ AND LIACFIN = FOUCFIN AND LIACINAP = SAPCINAP AND SAPTYPE = 1 /* Supply sector*/ AND LIASITE = ARASITE AND ARASITE = :param2 AND ARACFIN = FOUCFIN AND ARACCIN = LIACCIN AND ARATFOU = 1 AND ARADFIN > TRUNC(SYSDATE - 60))
WHERE RK = 1 GROUP BY CCLCINRC, COMM_ORD, COMM_ORD_DESC, COMM_PREP, COMM_PREP_DESC) SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, ''MM.DD.RR'') || DECODE(:param2, 90061, '' Grocery'', 91070, '' Dairy'', 91071, '' Freezer'', :param2) || '' Fill Rate '' || NVL((SELECT TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(QTY_PREP) / SUM(QTY_ORD), 4) * 100) FROM DETAIL), 100) || ''% & In-Stock Rate '' || TO_CHAR(ROUND((1 - (NVL((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DETAIL WHERE NVL(QTY_PREP, 0) = 0), 0) / NVL((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DETAIL), 1))), 4) * 100) || ''%'' "Category code desc.", NULL "Supplier code desc.", NULL "Ord. quantity", NULL "Prep. quantity", NULL "Holes", NULL "Unique items ord.", NULL "Fill rate", NULL "In-Stock rate", ''Recap'' "Notes" FROM DUAL WHERE (SELECT SUM(QTY_ORD) FROM DETAIL) > 0 UNION SELECT "Category code desc.", "Supplier code desc.", "Ord. quantity", "Prep. quantity", "Holes", "Unique items ord.", (ROUND("Prep. quantity"/"Ord. quantity",4)* 100) "Fill rate", (ROUND((1 - "Holes"/ "Unique items ord.") ,4)* 100) "In-Stock rate", "Notes" FROM (SELECT CAT "Category code desc.", "Supplier code desc.", CEIL(SUM(QTY_ORD)) "Ord. quantity", CEIL(SUM(QTY_PREP)) "Prep. quantity", COUNT(CASE WHEN (QTY_ORD - QTY_PREP) > 0 THEN 1 END) "Holes", count(distinct COMM_ORD) "Unique items ord.", '' '' "Notes" FROM DETAIL GROUP BY CAT, "Supplier code desc.") ORDER BY "Notes" DESC, "Holes" DESC, 1, 2
ROOT.HEADERIFEMPTY: No Warehouse fill rate by cat
